reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress beautiful, with one noting the shoulder details add a nice touch, and appreciate its true-to-size fit that accommodates larger chests. The dress receives positive feedback for its quality, comfort, and versatility, being perfect for both weddings and casual summer events. Customers love the color, with accurate online photos, and find it flattering, with one mentioning the smocking provides support and modesty. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Dress and Perfect Fit
items.body: I absolutely love this dress! The material feels soft and high-quality, and it fits perfectlyâ€”true to size with just the right amount of stretch. The color is even more beautiful in person, and itâ€™s very flattering. I received so many compliments when I wore it! Itâ€™s comfortable enough for all-day wear and perfect for both casual and dressy occasions. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a stylish and well-made dress. Read more
items.author: Miveliss Rodriguez

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great color
items.body: Beautiful dress with a soft, flowy fit. The material is lightweight and perfect. I love the length and the feminine look. It does run slightly long, so heels or wedges help if youâ€™re shorter. Very pretty and flattering for photos or events. Read more
items.author: Kristi Cobb

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bump-friendly pick + great for postpartum!
items.body: I wore this dress for my baby shower and it was the perfect fit. It is very bump friendly and looked elegant for my event. I have used it postpartum as well for church and it's just a great dress to have in your closet. It's very comfortable and the straps cover your bra straps, so you don't have to wear a strapless bra, which is even better. It isn't too sheer and I like that it runs true to size. Again, if you are looking for a bump friendly dress, this is a great pick! Read more
items.author: Lauren Butler

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful classic tulle dress
items.body: I love this dress so much! The one thing I don't like is that the lining is a little too short for a sheer dress, I wish it was the same length as the tulle, then this would be the perfect dress! You can wear this dress with a bra surprisingly and the straps don't show even though the sleeves are sheer, the stitching provides coverage on the shoulders! This dress hides the armpit area that I'm always looking to cover! It's a great design and great shape! Very flattering and super stretchy! This fit while pregnant and before/after through all of my weight changes! I love it! The dress is lightweight and breathable! Such a great value because it looks thick and eexpensive but is not a bad price at all! Highly recommend this dress for all occasions! I bought it in green too to use for Christmas pictures! I ordered this in Medium and Large and both fit well but I kept the medium so I could wear it after pregnancy, the medium is the one in photos I posted, but both sizes looked the same and were a great fit! Read more
items.author: Christie B

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this
items.body: This dress is absolutely gorgeous! The tulle layers give it such a soft, flowy look, and it feels light and comfortable to wear. Perfect for summer weddings, parties, or even just dressing up a bitâ€”it looks elegant without being too over the top. The fit was true to size, and I got so many compliments wearing it. Definitely a great buy for the price! Read more
items.author: Whit

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Received return merchandise.
items.body: The number of stars is based on honestly how this was handled. I received returned merchandise.. yes, the dress still had a tag on it, but the bag itself was cut open. It didnâ€™t get taped to seal it again. It was wide open that if I didnâ€™t have a decent delivery driver, they couldâ€™ve stole that dressâ€¦ it does have a slight odor also. Other than that, the dress has good lining not see-through at all the material seems very good quality, super easy to slide on and wear. I will say sizing told me to get an XL, but I went with a L, i am a 36DDD, 5â€™3, 170ish pound pear shaped woman. The dress is cute and I wouldâ€™ve returned it and swapped it out for a not returned item, but sadly, it would not be here in time for the wedding. Read more
items.author: Abby

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely dress
items.body: Nice and soft in the inside, stretchy and fits well, very comfortable. I am 5â€™7, 165 lbs and medium was perfect. Bought for a November wedding and this was exactly what I was looking for. I do not like my belly and it hides my pooch. Picture is trying it on straight out of the bag without shape wear. Read more
items.author: Michelle Armstrong

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love this dress!
items.body: This dress is super comfortable and flattering. I really like the unique strapsâ€”they add a fun touch. The material is great quality, and it lays nicely on the body. Itâ€™s fitted just rightâ€”not too tight and not too looseâ€”so it gives you a nice shape. Perfect for dressing up or keeping it casual for any event! Read more
items.author: T__M__C

short_description:
Womens Dress Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Dress Sleeveless is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Floral Navy Blue, Grey Blue, Floral Orange Pink Red, Army Green, Light Green, Black, Floral Black Yellow, Floral Apricot Orange, Dark Green, Floral Blue Yellow, Light Blue, Rose Red, Navy, Wine Red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
